snippet: A year after the war started in southeastern Ukraine, the Russian military has largely abandoned efforts to disguise its activities along the border.
abstract: Tiny village of Golovinka in Russia's historically pastoral steppe region has been greatly affected by intense military activity surrounding nearby Kuzminka military base in midst of Ukraine conflict; Ukrainian and Western governments claim Kuzminka is staging ground for Russian soldiers and weapons headed into the war zone in southeastern Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: A year after the war started in southeastern Ukraine, the Russian military has largely abandoned efforts to disguise its activities along the border.

headline.main: Russian Town Near Ukraine, Once Quiet, Now Buzzes With Military Activity
headline.print_headline: A Once Quiet Russian Town Buzzes With Military Activity

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
